clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Box application client ID from the Box Developer Console

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Box application client secret from the Box Developer Console

tokenUrl.title: Token URL
tokenUrl.description: OAuth2 token endpoint URL for Box.com

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token
refreshToken.description: OAuth2 refresh token for long-term access (recommended). Box issues new refresh tokens on each token refresh.

accessToken.title: Access Token
accessToken.description: OAuth2 access token for temporary direct access (short-lived, not recommended for production)

enterpriseId.title: Enterprise ID
enterpriseId.description: Box enterprise ID for client credentials grant authentication (required for service account access)

boxSubjectType.title: Subject Type
boxSubjectType.description: Type of subject to authenticate as (enterprise or user). Used with client credentials grant.

boxSubjectId.title: Subject ID
boxSubjectId.description: Enterprise ID or User ID to authenticate as. Used with client credentials grant for 'act as' functionality.

rootFolderId.title: Root Folder ID
rootFolderId.description: Optional Box folder ID to restrict access to a specific folder. Defaults to '0' (root).
